long_description: The Pacsafe Stashsafe 100 GII hip pack packs some punch with its clever organizational and anti-theft features. Includes a keyed padlock so you don't have to wear it 24-7. Includes a keyed padlock to lock Stashsafe to a secure fixture, like the leg of a chair in a cafe or to a radiator in your hotel room. Features eXomesh(R) slashguards: lightweight stainless-steel wire mesh is built discreetly into areas normally targeted by bag slashers. RFID-reader-blocking pocket prevents access to your personal data stored on micro chips in your passport and credit cards. Flexible, lightweight stainless-steel wire is also integrated into adjustable waist strap to prevent bag slashers from slicing through and running off with your gear. Comfortable, breathable padded mesh back. 2 main zippered compartments for organizing your stuff; rear zippered stash pocket. Pacsafe Stashsafe 100 hip pack includes a padded electronic gadget pocket, headphone port and key clip. Weight includes the keyed padlock. Please note: Stashsafe 100 does not have Smart zipper security(R). If you are looking for this feature please consider the Venturesafe 100 Fanny Pack, available separately.
short_description: The Pacsafe Stashsafe 100 GII hip pack packs some punch with its clever organizational and anti-theft features. Includes a keyed padlock so you don't have to wear it 24-7.
